title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Shooting at Indianapolis Airport. Rush never lost his faith that America would always be the land of opportunity. Kathryn Limbaugh joins the show to discuss the documentary film streaming at RushLimbaugh.com: A Tribute to Radio's Greatest of All-Time -- Rush Hudson Limbaugh III. Kathryn interviews finalists for the Great American Business Award. Jon Cartwright, owner of Zimmerman Meats, in Summersville, Missouri. Jon was inspired by Rush, left corporate America to take a risk and start his own business with his brother -- and even named his son after Rush. Julie Welch, owner of Oak Knolls Manor in Caledonia, New York. Julie's daughter with hearing loss was inspired by Rush, now is 22 and finishing a Masters degree. Patty Kline of Sittler Golf in Sinking Spring, Pennsylvania. Rush inspired Patty and her husband to start their company. Kathryn announces today's winner: Jon Cartwright, owner of Zimmerman Meats, wins today's Great American Business Award and a $25,000 grant from Rush and Kathryn.  

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Democrat-inspired violence and looting across the country. Rush on how riots are an offshoot at the Democrat Party. RGB was against court packing, Democrats want to expand the court to 13 anyway. Is Pelosi really putting the brakes on court-packing plan? Rush exposed Biden's court-packing plan way before the election. Harris seems utterly unconcerned about the crisis on the border. Kristi Noem refuses illegal migrant children. Anyone remember Fast & Furious?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Nebraska’s Governor has declared that Nebraska is a Second Amendment sanctuary state. Rush talks about everyone’s favorite Governor Andrew Cuomo of New York and his comments on gun control during his state of the state address. Flashback to when Rush analyzed Obama denouncing wokeness. Caller: Rush is the best friend I never met. EIB High Note: Rush loved to give out iPhones.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
